past_employers.employee_description:
Solved complex real word problems through data science and tech. The major projects were :

Banking chatbot: Many banking and finance firms try to provide 24*7 service to their customers and do that; NLP is required. We used IBM Watson and deployed it on a nodeJS server for its easier NLP processing and configurable dialogue flow. 

Image Processing using Tesseract OCR: This project involved masking the first eight digits of the Aadhar card because of a change in government norms to lessen the manual labour. We hid it using tesseract OCR and OpenCV. In the end,60 to 70 percent accuracy was achieved on complete masking by applying grayscale and a morphological top-hat function kernel on the scaled image, saving thousands of dollars.

Collateral Tracker: Came up with a web scraping solution using google news and magicBricks APIs to see which companies laid off because of covid 19 and how the loans sanctioned based on the salaries of those fired will be affected. We also checked how property rates would be affected because of covid-19 and which properties can’t be used as sufficient collateral for the loans already sanctioned by Piramal

past_employers.employee_description:
I worked in the product quality team of Marketplaces Flipkart, India’s largest e-commerce firm part of the Walmart Group and have worked on HLD and LLD of complex microservices. Besides this, I worked on Kubernetes and serve as the SCRUM master for the team. Among the projects I have worked on, the following are the significant features:

Actioning service: Developed a service where any brand or vertical regulation changes will automatically delist and relist products on Flipkart from scratch. This also helped save 40 hours/week of ops bandwidth and worked on both the low and high-level design and implementation for it.

Juno: Before sellers enter into the Flipkart ecosystem, sellers need to get approvals under certain brands and verticals, Juno as a system handles all of that. Juno is a combination of 10 microservices following an orchestrator pattern architecturally. I work on the LLD and design for most of the apps in JUNO.

Expiry Workflow: Designed an Activiti(BPMN) based workflow and implemented it to make non-expirable invoices expirable in nature, reducing the number of fakes by 10 percent and increasing the seller NPS by 20 percent.

Kubernetes Stateful Onboarding: Did the Proof of Concept for onboarding a stateful service; in this case, the leading team owned Elastic Search server to Kubernetes.

OTC Location Approval Flow: Location and listing level actioning of items by using ops ingestion pipelines to notify fulfilment systems and provide the necessary order cancellations for a particular listing being sold at a particular location.

I also am an active part of campus hiring as well and have taken multiple problem solving interviews for different roles

profile_data.name: Satvik Paramkusham
profile_data.title: Developer Relations Lead
profile_data.summary:
Hello, I'm Satvik, an IIT Delhi alumnus and a passionate AI innovator. With a strong background in data science and a drive to harness the power of Generative AI, I founded "Build Fast with AI" to help companies and individuals integrate cutting-edge AI technologies into their products and upskill their teams.

In just 9 months, we've made significant strides:
- Trained 5000+ professionals, including leaders from BCG, Google, Freshworks, and Shell, through our flagship 4-week Crash Course and workshops on Generative AI
- Enabled 10+ startups to embed Generative AI into their offerings, enhancing functionality and user experience
- Built a thriving "Build Fast with AI" community of AI pioneers across industries

My expertise spans LLMs, AI Chatbots, Vector Databases, Fine-tuning, AI Agents, and more. I've developed over 50+ AI apps and conducted workshops for 5,000+ attendees globally.

Education is also close to my heart. As a co-founder of Intellify, a non-profit, we partnered with MHRD, Teach for India, CBSE, and the Delhi Government to improve education for 100,000+ students across 150+ Indian cities.

Today, I offer AI workshops, consulting, and speaking services to help businesses leverage AI's transformative potential. If you're excited about AI's possibilities or want to learn more, let's connect at satvik@buildfastwithai.com.

Together, let's build fast and innovate with AI!

Avanti (www.avanti.in) is among India's fastest growing and best funded education start-ups (over $7M in funding raised till date). Our programs focus on competitive exam preparation (IIT JEE, CET, NEET). As a social enterprise our mission is to deliver this high-quality education in every district in India. , , , , Avanti is also the only education institute to play a major role in developing education policy at the national level with major work with the governments of Haryana, Delhi and the Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti. Avanti is also the trusted partner for coaching in major PSU and corporate townships including Gujarat Ambuja, JSW Steel, National Fertilizers Limited, GAIL, Narora Atomic Power Corporation among others. , , , , Unlike many coaching institutes we do not use a one-size-fits-all approach. Our specialized programs for students are based on their aspirations, academic level and needs.
